amendment.description: To provide additional assistance under the non-insured crop assistance program for certain producers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3321 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3321 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 3224. (consideration: CR S4713-4715; text: CR S4715) To provide additional assistance under the non-insured crop assistance program for certain producers.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3321 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 3224.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3321 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
